title: STUNNING, HUGE, BRIGHT - TOP FLOOR - 3BR/GARAGE
posting_body: STUNNING, HUGE, BRIGHT - TOP FLOOR - 3BR/GARAGE - AVAILABLE AUG 15!!!!!
This gorgeous unit is in midst of complete renovation...ready to view when you are!!!
Huge & Bright 3 bedroom unit in heart of fabulous Ukrainian Village.
Unit faces south and is on top floor - providing crazy natural light.
Kitchen is huge with enough room for a table & chairs...all appliances are stainless steel.
Lovely north facing deck for that charished cup of coffee in the morning and the glass of wine at end of day.
Garden is also provided for tenant use but is shared.
Garage space for one car is included in price of rent.
Center of town...easy commute anywhere in the city.
Delicious entertaing and shopping literally steps away.
Can show at any time even when in time of renovation...use your imagination!
